channel.title: News on Kejin Wu
channel.description: Recent content in News on Kejin Wu

item.title: My First Academia Job, Assistant Professor at Loyola University Chicago
item.description: I am glad to join the Department of Mathematics and Statistics, Loyola University Chicago, as an Assistant Professor in Aug. 2025.

item.title: Passed The Defense Talk of My Ph.D.
item.description: I am glad to pass my defense talk of my Ph.D at University of California San Diego. Thanks to my parents. Thanks to my advisor Dimitris Politis and my committee members Danna Zhang, Ery Arias-Castro and Yian Ma. Thanks to all my friends. Defense Talk Slides

item.title: Workshop Statistical Frontiers in LLMs and Foundation Models NeurIPS 2024
item.description: I am glad to present two posters at workshop on Statistical Frontiers in LLMs and Foundation Models. (NeurIPS 2024 in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada) Poster: Deep Limit Model Free Prediction Poster: Scalable Subsampling Inference for Deep Neural Networks

item.title: Advance to Candidacy
item.description: These are news for me at UCSD.

item.title: Receive Richard Libby Graduate Research Award
item.description: These are news for me at UCSD.
